ygData.subject: in search of my eq soul-mate
ygData.msgSnippet: My Bio name: Paul A. Massa age: 31 height 5 9 weight: 175 pounds eyes: hazel pets: dog named suki brothers/sisters:4 brothers and 1 sister fav colors:
ygData.messageBody:
My Bio
name: Paul A. Massa
age: 31
height 5' 9"
weight: 175 pounds
eyes: hazel
pets: dog named suki
brothers/sisters:4 brothers and 1 sister
fav colors: blue,red and black
fav foods: italian, mexican and american
interests: drawing,listening to music,
watching movies, cartoons, animation, going for walks,
swimming,playing everquest,and
spending time with my family and friends
dislikes: people who don't listen and cold weather and rap music
(Yuck!)
nationalities: italian/scottish hungarian and penn. dutch
birthday: July 27th
future goals: my soul mate, my best friend who I'm going to spend the
rest of
my life loving, laughing and raising children with
personal description: I don't drink or smoke never done drugs. I
don't have
any children, but I alot of nieces and nephews. Sometimes I can be on
the quiet side, and other times you would need a roll of duct tape to
shut me up. I'm a passionate, compassionate person and a hopeless
romantic.





What I'm looking for
Do you believe in honesty,loyalty and truthfullness,then look no
further. I am looking for someone with good communication, open and
honest. I am looking for my a friend, best friend and lover. I want
someone romantic and who is a a single un-attached female who has no
kids but would like to have some some day for a possible relationship
and preferred age range around 24-32 years of age and from around the
saginaw,midland,mt.pleasant or sanford area and must be from Michigan
and either a hispanic caucasian,native american or a oriental or a
middle eastern. Someone who likes to kiss, cuddle and hold hands. I
am open and honest and have a good heart.I want someone who also
likes playing computer or online games like
everquest,reading,writing,travelling, bowling,chatting,walks on the
beach,jet-skiing,and many other things. I want someone who likes to
travel. I am ready to settle down. Well, I hope to hear from that
special person and my email is massaman@...
